### exSTRa repeat expansion disorder GRCh38 database ###																						
# Last updated 19 December 2019.																						
# Note that this is for the GRCh38 human genome reference. 																						
# Columns *hg19_start* and *hg19_end* are named for compatability with our scripts.																						
# We intend to modify the code such that these column names can be less confusing.																						
# Most fields are for informational purposes and not used by exSTRa.																						
# Requires: exSTRa 0.8
